formula: For n>0: a(n)=a(n-1)^2+2*A051009(n)^2, a(n)^2=2*A051009(n+1)^2+1. - Mario Catalani (mario.catalani(AT)unito.it), May 27 2003a(n)=sum(Binomial[2^n, 2r]2^r, r=0, .., 2^(n-1)). - Mario Catalani (mario.catalani(AT)unito.it), May 30 2003Expansion of 1/sqrt(2) as an infinite product: 1/sqrt(2) = prod(k=1, infinity, 1-1/(a(n)+1)). a(1)=3; a(n) = floor(1/(1-1/(sqrt(2)*prod(k=1, n-1, 1-1/(a(k)+1))))). - _Thomas Baruchel_, Nov 06 2003A003423(n)=2*a(n+1).a(n)=(1/2)*((1 + sqrt(2))^(2^n) + (1 - sqrt(2))^(2^n)). - _Artur Jasinski_, Oct 10 2008For n>1: a(n)-1 = 4^n * prod(i=1, n-2, a(i)^2). - _Jose Hortal_, Apr 13 20124*sqrt(2)/7 = product {n = 1..inf} (1 - 1/(2*a(n))). sqrt(2) = product {n = 1..inf} (1 + 1/a(n)). a(n) = 1/2*A003423(n-1). - _Peter Bala_, Nov 11 2012
